title: PRISM: Mitigating EHR Data Sparsity via Learning from Missing Feature Calibrated Prototype Patient Representations
details: Y Zhu, Z Wang, L He, S Xie, X Zheng, L Ma, C Pan - Proceedings of the 33rd ACM …, 2024
abstract: Electronic Health Records (EHRs) provide valuable patient data but often suffer from sparsity issue, posing significant challenges in predictive modeling. Conventional imputation methods inadequately distinguish between real and imputed data …
